detailGridOptions.description: Provide Grid Options to use for the Detail Grid. It should be either an object (for once set of Grid Options for all Detail Grids) or a function (to set different Grid Options for different Detail Grids).

getDetailRowData.description: A function that provides what rows to display in the Detail Grid.

template.description: Allows changing the template used around the Detail Grid.

refreshStrategy.description: Defines how to refresh the Detail Grids as data is changing in the Master Grid.
